title: T.V. commercials: Mobil circle of safety
creator_contributor_role: George Patterson Creative Group, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising - Australia - History

description: A series of television commercials made with the aim of promoting road safety and advertising the mechanical safety services available from the Mobil service stations. The nine commercials include: Swinging tyres, Traffic trauma, Eye, Cannonball, Queue, Go back, Cosmos, Belt up and Playground. Intellegent copy and strong images reinforce the message as well as the oil company's logo.
